item.title: liberal software
item.description: I ran into this thought provoking though when randomly attempting to relax this weekend. There’s a summary at LWN if you do not want to watch the talk - but as the lwn summarizer admits, the video definitely conveys things that are hard to capture on text. The core takeaway for me is to think about: what is the future of free and open-source software? The answer was: it has no future.
